pageContext.claim: “And Stacey Abrams wants illegal aliens to vote. You know, that's one of the big deals here. They like them coming in because we're winning and they figure if enough of them come in, eventually they'll be able to vote and they're going to vote for the Democrats, right?”
pageContext.analysis: Abrams never said undocumented immigrants should be able to vote, which would be illegal. She said at one campaign stop: "The blue wave is African-American. It's white, it's Latino, it's Asian-Pacific Islander. It is disabled. It is differently-abled. It is LGBTQ. It is law enforcement. It is veterans. It is made up of those who have been told they are not worthy of being here. It is comprised of those who are documented and undocumented. It is comprised of those who have been told they're successful and those who have been left behind." And then she clarified she did not mean to suggest that undocumented immigrants should have the right to vote, only that she would look out for them.
